mapper.insert: insert into hq_trans_log (user_id, trans_no, pay_no, trans_amt, before_amt, after_amt, trans_time, trans_kind, balance_type, status, withdraw_fee, bank_code, bank_name, bank_card, update_time ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beforeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{afterAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update hq_trans_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trans_no = #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_no = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_amt = #{transAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, before_amt = #{beforeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, after_amt = #{afterAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, trans_time = #{transTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trans_kind = #{transKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, withdraw_fee = #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bank_code = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where hq_trans_log_id = #{hqTransLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select hq_trans_log_id, user_id, trans_no, pay_no, trans_amt, before_amt, after_amt, trans_time, trans_kind, balance_type, status, withdraw_fee, bank_code, bank_name, bank_card, update_time from hq_trans_log where hq_trans_log_id = #{hqTransLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select hq_trans_log_id, user_id, trans_no, pay_no, trans_amt, before_amt, after_amt, trans_time, trans_kind, balance_type, status, withdraw_fee, bank_code, bank_name, bank_card, update_time from hq_trans_log
